text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(…Now then. Somehow, some way, I'd like to find the key 
to taking "the best photo" in today's photo shoot…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Crown! To-Today… I'm not my usual self!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …Mmyeah. Now that you say it, the air about you has sort of… Although I'm unsure what's changed, more concretely…

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Today's Chevacchi is the very confident "Super Chevacchi".

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Yea… I'll no longer think "someone like me" can't do it. 
I will overcome my cowardice. No matter what kind of photo 
shoot awaits… I'll see it through without saying it's impossible!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I think you might be getting carried away a little… hehe. But that's fine. The new swimsuit is sort of a lucky charm for that purpose after all.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
That's right! It's rare you wear such a cute swimsuit, 
so you should look to be the center of attention☆ 
What's the first shoot, Crown?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
It will be the water slide! It's one of the highlights 
of the renewal. That means it's one of our primary 
targets that will attract lots of attention!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
O-Okay… ! If I can perform well on such an 
important shot, I should have no issues for 
the rest of the photo shoot… I think!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Good, good☆ 
Go, go, Chevacchi♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Wait! The preparations aren't…… ! 
Hello, listen to meeeee!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …Heh. If we are seeking a drastically new approach to the photos we have, such energy might be necessary.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Well… she's a lot more fired up than expected. 
But Cheval's strong when she faces forward like that, y'know.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
This is bad though, I have to hurry with the preparations… 
Umm… the camera and lighting ——

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …Duramente, can I ask you to handle the preparations here?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
No need to worry. I have been observing your work 
since the beginning, I have memorised the workflow.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
In that case, Duramente, and Shion, please finalise the 
preparations with the crew! I will look after those two!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Attention… all attention will be focused here… 
…Vivlos, to attract attention here… what should I ——

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Okaaay! Everyone look here! 
Chevacchi will now slide down while singing☆

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: ……Eh…… Eeeeeeh!?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
It'll be finey-fine♪ This place is high up and eye-catching, 
it's just like a stage☆ See, the guests below have all their 
attention on us♪

text_block_list.name: Resort Patron
text_block_list.text:
Oh… aren't those girls running in the Twinkle Series? 
Sounds interesting, let's go have a look!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I did say I will overcome my fears, but…! Aaah…! 
People are already starting to gather……!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
W-What do I do, Crown? I can't back out of this anymore. 
B-But what song to sing……!? U…… Uma…… pyoi……?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Hold, hold, Cheval, take a breath. 
You're getting carried away again!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: I-I got it! Since you're already here, Crown, sing it with me…! Hoo… haa… hoo… haa… On your marks ——

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Get set…

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Wait, wait! W-We haven't given the signal to the crew below yet! Wawawawawa……!? The floatie ——

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Goooo!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Ba……Badump, buh-duuuum!!!!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Woo-hwooo!!!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Kyaaaaaaaaaaaaah!?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: ……They sure are coming down really noisily……

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
…There wasn't a signal to start the shoot… but no problem. 
Camera operator, aim to capture the moment of impact.

text_block_list.name: Cheval & Crown
text_block_list.text: Waa!? Kyaaa!?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Kyaaahaha☆

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Heeey, you girls alright?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Puh…… Khehe…… Kya…… "Kyaaaaa"…… Crown, you… "Kyaaaaa"…… Ahaha!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Riiight? Isn't that the funniest reaction today!?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Wh… What about it! I got caught in that incomprehensible 
flow of events, what did you expect!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…No, no good… I laugh as soon as I remember it, 
my stomach is about to cramp……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Hrrrmm…… ……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ……This sensation…… I recognize it from somewhere ——

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
In the ad I saw when I was young, in that promo magazine… 
The smile of genuine enjoyment on the girl I know nothing 
about's face.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
A certain horsegirl named Cheval Grand's 
smile, that one day at a major race…

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: —— Yes, that's it… That's what it was.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
I… think I might have found it. 
What our PR photos truly need!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …So, about the photo shoot plans moving forward ——

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Wha!?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: You just tore it!?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Since I found it in yesterday's shoot, I'm setting 
things right. The path to taking "the best PR photos"!
